action.query: CREATE TABLE `#__ak_profiles` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `configuration` longtext, `filters` longtext, `quickicon` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8;

CREATE TABLE `#__ak_stats` ( `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `comment` longtext, `backupstart` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `backupend` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL, `status` enum('run','fail','complete') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'run', `origin` varchar(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'backend', `type` varchar(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'full', `profile_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `archivename` longtext, `absolute_path` longtext, `multipart` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `tag` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `backupid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `filesexist` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `remote_filename` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `total_size` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `frozen` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `instep` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idx_fullstatus` (`filesexist`,`status`), KEY `idx_stale` (`status`,`origin`) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8;

CREATE TABLE `#__ak_users` ( `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `username` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `parameters` longtext, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8;

CREATE TABLE `#__ak_schedules` ( `id` BIGINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `description` VARCHAR(255) NULL, `profile_id` INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `cron_expression` TEXT, `last_exit` TINYINT SIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `last_run_start` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `last_run_end` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL, `storage` MEDIUMTEXT, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), CONSTRAINT FOREIGN KEY `#__ak_schedules_profile` (`profile_id`) REFERENCES `#__ak_profiles` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE, INDEX (`last_exit`) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8;
ALTER TABLE `#__ak_stats` ADD COLUMN `backupid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL AFTER `tag`
ALTER TABLE `#__ak_profiles` ADD COLUMN `quickicon` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' AFTER `filters`
ALTER TABLE `#__akeeba_common` MODIFY COLUMN `key` varchar(190) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE `#__ak_stats` ADD COLUMN `frozen` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0';
ALTER TABLE `#__ak_stats` ADD COLUMN `instep` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0';
ALTER TABLE `#__ak_stats` MODIFY `backupstart` TIMESTAMP NULL DEFAULT NULL;
UPDATE `#__ak_stats` SET `backupstart` = NULL WHERE `backupstart` = '0000-00-00 00:00:00';
ALTER TABLE `#__ak_stats` MODIFY `backupend` TIMESTAMP NULL DEFAULT NULL;
UPDATE `#__ak_stats` SET `backupend` = NULL WHERE `backupend` = '0000-00-00 00:00:00';
TRUNCATE TABLE `#__ak_storage`;
